oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Enhanced Mobile Membranes: Computability Results
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CIOBANU, G
KRISHNA, SN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mobile membranes
Computational power
Parikh vectors
Lindenmayer systems
Matrix grammars
Register machines
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The enhanced mobile membranes is a variant of membrane systems which has been proposed for describing some biological mechanisms of the immune system. In this paper, we study the computational power of the enhanced mobile membranes. In particular, we focus on the power of mobility given by the operations endo, exo, fendo and fexo. The computational universality is obtained with 12 membranes, while systems with 8 membranes subsume PsET0L, and those with 3 membranes are contained in PsMAT.
